alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 9:56AM CST until January 12 at 10:30AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jackson County in northeastern Alabama... Northeastern DeKalb County in northeastern Alabama... * Until 1030 AM CST. * At 956 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Scottsboro, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scottsboro, Henagar, Hollywood, Section, Ider, Pisgah, Dutton, Martintown, Higdon and Fackler. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for north central and northeastern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee.
